snippet: The proposed pact may include the wage-progression formula used in the Fiat Chrysler contract to eventually bring newer workers up to wage parity.
abstract: General Motors' tentative deal with 52,000 members of United Automobile Workers is set for approval by union leaders.
lead_paragraph: The proposed pact may include the wage-progression formula used in the Fiat Chrysler contract to eventually bring newer workers up to wage parity.

headline.print_headline: G.M.’s Tentative Labor Deal Is Set for Approval by Union Leaders
headline.main: G.M.’s Tentative Labor Deal Is Set for Approval by Union Leaders
